column5: Why study this courseThis is an interprofessional, distance learning course, intended for healthcare professionals who want to specialise in the field of surgical and perioperative care.This part-time programme is aimed at registered nurses, doctors, operating department practitioners and other healthcare professionals.Â The programme aims to offer knowledge and expertise to provide a transition between theory and your own clinical practice. It draws together a collection of fundamental information in an e-learning format, with an emphasis on the general principles of surgical practice rather than on the management of specific conditions.
